ygData.subject: Preparing for a battle at the Ark
ygData.msgSnippet: Triceradon receives Firearm s transmission about there being a battle about to start at the Ark. We need to help defend the Ark. Come on Ultracon. He says.

Subject: Preparing for a battle at the Ark

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="us-ascii"

Triceradon receives Firearm's transmission about there being a battle about 
to start at the Ark. 
"We need to help defend the Ark. Come on Ultracon." He says.
The two Maximal Dinobots stand guard outside the Ark ready for anything.
